name: Who is Guilty?
description:
Who is Guilty is an adventure game with puzzle elements. Guess who is responsible for the crime and avenge the victim!

Talk with people to get useful information.

Solve puzzles that will help you infer who commited the murder.

Kill everyone involved in the crime. However, be vigilant - if there is someone innocent among the people killed, you lose.

Special thanks to everyone who helped translate the game.
